name: Moguu's Nest
description:
Welcome to the underground world.
My name is Moguu.
My goal in life is to build up my best nest.

Dig soils at your will, construct various kinds of institutions, install traps against enemies and deploy pets as your army.
There are magics, or attack magic and defense magic.
There are already ingredients to create the best nest.

I live in the underground of Potato potato plain.
It's nice that there are my favorite potatos here.
Potatos here taste good raw.

Oh, I feel enemies coming.
I have no time.
I'll build up a strong nest to drive enemies away.

Moguu punch!
Moguu kick!!
ZzzZzz...
